name: inv3rted
description:
THANKS FOR PLAYING

Play on Chrome or Firefox and download the game for the best experience.

CONTROLS

Invert controls: I (You can do this to play alone and control two protagonists with the same keys)

===Player 1 (Blond)===

Move: A,D

Jump: W

Shoot: Space

===Player 2 (Red hair)===

Move: A,D

Jump: W

Teleportation: Right Control (with an alien stunned)

============================== XBOX360 CONTROLS!!!!! ==============================

Shoot: X (Blond)

Teleportation: X (Red hair) and with an alien stunned

Invert controls: Y

Authors

Game created by Daniel Castaño (nenperdut) & Jordi García (pixelmeat) for the #GueimBcnJam in 48h totally from scratch.

Story

You control two sisters defeating the evil jelly brain aliens. Blond sister has a quantic shotgun that can stun aliens and red hair sister has the power of changing her position to the stunned alien position.

Jelly brain aliens hate fire.

Coop to win.

Music

Menu: Mystline (Samurai Champloo OST)

Levels: 1st Samurai (Samurai Champloo OST)

Feedback

Mac OS X and Linux versiones have not been tested, thanks for your feedback ;)
